status_import_running: Importing/updating database (this may take a while)...
status_import_failed_file_missing: Error: Import finished, but database file is missing.
status_compare_no_data_found: Error: No data found for any of the TG-Codes.
status_compare_folder_error: Error creating export folder for comparison: {error}
msg_import_file_not_found:
File not found: {error}
Please ensure the source file exists or can be downloaded.
msg_import_db_error:
Database error: {error}
The database might be corrupt or locked.
msg_import_download_error:
Download error: {error}
Please check your internet connection and the download URL.
msg_import_io_error:
File access error: {error}
Please check permissions.
msg_import_os_error:
Operating system error: {error}
Please check permissions or if the DB is locked.
msg_import_complete: The vehicle database was successfully imported/updated.
msg_export_no_data: No vehicle data available to export. Please search first.
msg_export_unknown_error:
An unexpected error occurred during PDF export:
{error}
msg_compare_invalid_input: Please provide exactly 2 or 3 TG-Codes, separated by commas.
msg_compare_no_data_found: No data could be found for any of the specified TG-Codes.
msg_compare_db_error: Error accessing the database during comparison: {error}
msg_compare_unknown_error:
An unexpected error occurred during comparison:
{error}
msg_startup_db_path_missing:
DATABASE_PATH constant not found.
The application cannot start.
msg_db_missing_prompt:
Database '{db_path}' not found.

Do you want to try importing the data now? (Requires internet connection)
msg_db_missing_continue: Starting application without database. Search, Export, and Compare functions are unavailable until data is imported.
msg_db_init_failed:
Database '{db_path}' could not be initialized.
Please check your internet connection and try the import manually via the 'Data' menu.
